00027 void RoomManagement::newRoom(Room room)
00028 {
00029     QSqlQuery fetchquery;
00030     fetchquery = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00031     fetchquery.prepare("SELECT * FROM Rooms WHERE RoomNumber= :rNum");
00032     fetchquery.bindValue(":rNum",room.getRoomNumber());
00033     fetchquery.exec();
00034 
00035     while(fetchquery.next())
00036     {
00037         QMessageBox::information(0,"Input Data Error","This Number exists");
00038         return;
00039     }
00040 
00041     if(RoomManagement::checkInData(room))
00042         {
00043         QSqlQuery query;
00044         query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00045         query.prepare("insert into Rooms (RoomNumber,RoomFloor,Capacity,Extras)"
00046                                        "values(:rNum, :rFloor, :capacity, :extras)");
00047        query.bindValue(":rNum",room.getRoomNumber());
00048        query.bindValue(":rFloor",room.getRoomFloor());
00049        query.bindValue(":capacity",room.getCapacity());
00050        query.bindValue(":extras","");
00051        query.exec();
00052         }
00053 }

00062 void RoomManagement::deleteRoom(Room room)
00063 {
00064         QSqlQuery fetchquery;
00065         QSqlQuery query;
00066 
00067         fetchquery = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00068         fetchquery.prepare("SELECT * FROM RoomsReservation WHERE fkRoomId= :rNum");
00069         fetchquery.bindValue(":rNum",room.getRoomNumber());
00070         fetchquery.exec();
00071 
00072         fetchquery.next();
00073         if(fetchquery.isValid())
00074         {
00075            QMessageBox::information(0,"Input Data Error","This room can't be Deleted.Reservation in progress");
00076         }
00077     else
00078         {
00079             query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00080             query.prepare("delete from Rooms where RoomNumber = :rNum");
00081             query.bindValue(":rNum",room.getRoomNumber());
00082             query.exec();
00083         }
00084

00093 void RoomManagement::editRoom(Room room)
00094 {
00095          QSqlQuery query;
00096          QSqlQuery fetchquery;
00097 
00098          fetchquery = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00099          fetchquery.prepare("SELECT * FROM RoomsReservation WHERE fkRoomId= :rNum");
00100          fetchquery.bindValue(":rNum",room.getRoomNumber());
00101          fetchquery.exec();
00102 
00103          fetchquery.next();
00104          if(fetchquery.isValid())
00105              {
00106                    QMessageBox::information(0,"Input Data Error","This room can't be edited.Reservation in progress");
00107              }
00108          else
00109              {
00110                     query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00111                     query.prepare("update Rooms SET RoomFloor= :rFloor, Capacity= :capacity WHERE RoomNumber=:rNum");
00112                     query.bindValue(":rNum",room.getRoomNumber());
00113                     query.bindValue(":rFloor",room.getRoomFloor());
00114                     query.bindValue(":capacity",room.getCapacity());
00115                     query.exec();
00116              }
00117  }

00129 Room RoomManagement::fetchRoom(int roomnumber)
00130 {
00131    QSqlQuery fetchquery;
00132    int roomfloor,roomcapacity, rn = 0;
00133    QString roomextras;
00134    Room room;
00135    fetchquery = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00136    fetchquery.prepare("SELECT * FROM Rooms WHERE RoomNumber= :rNum");
00137    fetchquery.bindValue(":rNum",roomnumber);
00138    fetchquery.exec();
00139 
00140     while (fetchquery.next())
00141     {
00142         rn = fetchquery.value(0).toInt();
00143     roomfloor = fetchquery.value(1).toInt();
00144     roomcapacity = fetchquery.value(2).toInt();
00145     roomextras = fetchquery.value(4).toString();
00146     }
00147     room.setRoomNumber(rn);
00148     room.setRoomFloor(roomfloor);
00149     room.setCapacity(roomcapacity);
00150 
00151 
00152     return room;
00153 }

00196   vector<Room> RoomManagement::fetchFreeRooms()
00197   {
00198       Room room;
00199 
00200       vector<Room> freeVector;
00201 
00202      QSqlQuery fetchquery;
00203 
00204      fetchquery = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00205      fetchquery.exec("SELECT * FROM Rooms WHERE RoomNumber NOT IN (SELECT fkRoomId FROM RoomsReservation)");
00206 
00207      while(fetchquery.next())
00208      {
00209           room.setRoomNumber(fetchquery.value(0).toInt());
00210           room.setRoomFloor(fetchquery.value(1).toInt());
00211           room.setCapacity(fetchquery.value(2).toInt());
00212 
00213           freeVector.push_back( room );
00214      }
00215 
00216      return freeVector;

00327 bool RoomManagement::checkInData(Room room)
00328 {
00329 
00330     int rNum=room.getRoomNumber();
00331     int rFloor=room.getRoomFloor();
00332     int cpct=room.getCapacity();
00333     bool ret=false;
00334 
00335     if(0==rNum)
00336             {
00337                 QMessageBox::warning(0,"Input Data Error","Check the Room Number");
00338                 ret = false;
00339             }
00340     else
00341     {
00342             ret = true;
00343     }
00344 
00345     if(0==rFloor)
00346     {
00347 
00348                    QMessageBox::warning(0,"Input Data Error","Check the Room Floor");
00349                     ret = false;
00350 
00351     }
00352     else {
00353         ret = true;
00354     }
00355 
00356     if(0 == cpct)
00357         {
00358         QMessageBox::warning(0,"Input Data Error","Check the Capacity");
00359         ret = false;
00360 
00361         }
00362     else{
00363         ret= true;
00364 
00365     }
00366     return ret;
00367 }

00380 bool RoomManagement::getStatus(int roomNumber, QDate dateFrom, QDate dateTo)
00381 {
00382     QString date1;
00383     QString date2;
00384     QStringList SplitDate1;
00385     QStringList SplitDate2;
00386 
00387 
00388    QSqlQuery query;
00389 
00390    query.prepare("SELECT * FROM RoomsReservation WHERE fkRoomId= :rNum");
00391    query.bindValue(":rNum",roomNumber);
00392 
00393    if(!query.exec())
00394    {
00395        QMessageBox::information(0,"error","Execution Failed");
00396 
00397        return false;
00398 
00399    }
00400 
00401    while(query.next())
00402    {
00403        date1 = query.value(1).toString();
00404        date2 = query.value(2).toString();
00405 
00406        SplitDate1=date1.split("/");
00407        SplitDate2=date2.split("/");
00408 
00409        QString year1 = SplitDate1.at(2);
00410        QString day1 = SplitDate1.at(0);
00411        QString month1 = SplitDate1.at(1);
00412 
00413        QString year2 = SplitDate2.at(2);
00414        QString day2 = SplitDate2.at(0);
00415        QString month2 = SplitDate2.at(1);
00416 
00417        QDate checkIn(year1.toInt(),month1.toInt(),day1.toInt());
00418        QDate checkOut(year2.toInt(),month2.toInt(),day2.toInt());
00419 
00420 
00421 
00422         if((dateFrom >= checkIn && dateFrom <= checkOut)||
00423            (dateTo >=checkIn && dateTo <=checkOut)||
00424            (dateFrom <=checkIn && dateTo >=checkOut))
00425        {
00426             return true;
00427        }
00428 
00429     }
00430 
00431       return false;
00432 
00433 
00434 }

00448 vector<Room> RoomManagement::searchByDate(QDate dateFrom, QDate dateTo)
00449 {
00450     QSqlQuery query;
00451     QString date1;
00452     QString date2;
00453     QStringList SplitDate1;
00454     QStringList SplitDate2;
00455     bool free;
00456     vector<Room> rooms;
00457     vector<Room> freerooms;
00458 
00459     query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00460 
00461     freerooms = this->fetchFreeRooms();
00462     rooms = this->fetchReservedRooms();
00463 
00464     for(unsigned int i=0;i<rooms.size();i++)
00465     {
00466         free = true;
00467         query.prepare("SELECT * FROM RoomsReservation WHERE fkRoomId= :rNum");
00468         query.bindValue(":rNum" ,rooms[i].getRoomNumber() );
00469         query.exec();
00470 
00471         while(query.next())
00472         {
00473            date1 = query.value(1).toString();
00474            date2 = query.value(2).toString();
00475 
00476            SplitDate1=date1.split("/");
00477            SplitDate2=date2.split("/");
00478 
00479            QString year1 = SplitDate1.at(2);
00480            QString day1 = SplitDate1.at(0);
00481            QString month1 = SplitDate1.at(1);
00482 
00483            QString year2 = SplitDate2.at(2);
00484            QString day2 = SplitDate2.at(0);
00485            QString month2 = SplitDate2.at(1);
00486 
00487            QDate checkIn(year1.toInt(),month1.toInt(),day1.toInt());
00488            QDate checkOut(year2.toInt(),month2.toInt(),day2.toInt());
00489 
00490            if((dateFrom >= checkIn && dateFrom <= checkOut)||
00491                (dateTo >=checkIn && dateTo <=checkOut)||
00492                (dateFrom <=checkIn && dateTo >=checkOut))
00493                 {
00494                 free = false;
00495                 break;
00496                 }
00497         }
00498         if(free)
00499         {
00500             freerooms.push_back(rooms[i]);
00501         }
00502 
00503     }
00504 
00505      return freerooms;
00506 }
